mapper.select: select mr.member_role_id as memberRoleId, r.role_desc as roleDesc, r.role_name as roleName, res.resource_name as resourceName from member m inner join member_role mr inner join role r inner join role_resources rr inner join resources res ON m.mb_id = mr.mb_id AND mr.role_name = r.role_name and r.role_name = rr.role_name and rr.resource_name = res.resource_name WHERE m.mb_id = #{id}

select rr.role_resource_id as roleResourceId, res.resource_name as resourceName, res.resource_type as resourceType, r.role_name as roleName, r.role_desc as roleDesc from role_resources rr inner join role r inner join resources res on rr.role_name = r.role_name and rr.resource_name = res.resource_name
select resource_id as resourceId, resource_name as resourceName, resource_type as resoruceType from resources
SELECT role_id as roleId, role_desc as roleDesc, role_name as roleName FROM role ORDER BY role_desc asc
